column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLChemical and process engineers play a major role in developing the expertise and technologies behind products we desire or depend on in everyday life; thereby enhancing our standard of living. This programme facilitates multidisciplinary collaboration between scientists and engineers, providing graduates with the advanced training necessary to enter the chemical and related process industries and become independent, self-directed engineers.About this degreeModern society relies on the work of chemical, and in particular process, engineers.
